bibl.title: Maternal Division of Housed Property near the Temples of Memphis.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Said to have been found in Soknopaiou Nesos, but written in Memphis, I-II.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 24487 = P. Bagnall 34
Francisca A.J. Hoogendijk, Maternal Division of Housed Property near the Temples of Memphis.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 149-158, 1 fig.
Said to have been found in Soknopaiou Nesos, but written in Memphis, I-II.
